N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 3.7 - Commissioner of education

State Regulations
(a) The
signature of the Commissioner of Education as such shall be sufficient
indication of and shall validate his official action as commissioner. (b) Whenever a statutory power or duty is or
shall have been conferred or imposed upon the commissioner, such statutory
power or duty shall be exercised or performed in the department by or under the
direction of the commissioner for and in the name of the department. (c) A statutory power or duty heretofore or
hereafter assigned to the department, so far as the same is executive or
administrative, shall be exercised or performed in the department by the
commissioner, or by such agency or agencies of the department as he may
designate. Notes
